headline: HR SPECIALIST at US IMMIGRATION AND CUSTOMS ENFORCEMENT
summary:
o	Advanced leadership roles in event planning for political fundraisers, financial investment seminars for short-term commercial investments and trade shows. 
o	Ability to quickly adapt to ever-changing environments and challenges in both work team environments as well as individual accountabilities.
o	Development and execution of advertising campaigns from conception to implementation for: print, radio, television, electronic, outdoor: billboards, yard signs, doorknob hangers and direct mail. 
o	Initiated and coordinated theme development, marketing/advertising activities with advertising agencies, staff collaborations, printers and distribution centers.  
o	Creative enhancement of business website development, updates and enhancements. 
o	Co-creative designer and patent holder on two consumer products.
o	âGhost writerâ / editor for a book by an investment strategist executive.
